verses.text: Make a joyful \w noise|strong="H7321"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, all ye \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 100.1 \ft praise: or, thanksgiving\f*\f + \fr 100.1 \ft all…: Heb. all the earth\f*

\w Serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*: \w come|strong="H0935"\w* before his \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* with \w singing|strong="H7445"\w*.

\w Know|strong="H3045"\w* ye that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* he \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \add it is\add* he \add that\add* hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* us, and not we ourselves; \add we are\add* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* of his \w pasture|strong="H4830"\w*.\f + \fr 100.3 \ft and not…: or, and his we are\f*

\w Enter|strong="H0935"\w* into his \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* with \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*, \add and\add* into his \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* with \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*: be \w thankful|strong="H3034"\w* unto him, \add and\add* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add is\add* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*; and his \w truth|strong="H0530"\w* \add endureth\add* to \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.\f + \fr 100.5 \ft to all…: Heb. to generation and generation\f*
